name: 陳生明
objective:
包含 1. 先端材料的基礎知識：如材質及過程，複合構造及組織、材料的力學性質等基本知識。2. 各種複合材料的介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之介紹。3. 對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中，可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
ntroduction to Advanced Materials :including composite materials
The study of advanced materials encompasses fundamental knowledge such as material properties and processes, composite structures and microstructures, and mechanical properties. It includes an introduction to various composite materials like carbon fiber-reinforced composites, metal composites, and others, focusing on their principles and applications in cutting-edge technology fields. Composite materials can be categorized into polymer-based, metal-based, ceramic-based, and fiber composites, with fiber composites utilizing reinforcement components such as glass fibers, boron fibers, carbon fibers, organic fibers, ceramic fibers, and metal fibers, depending on requirements for strength, toughness, and cost. Key discussion topics cover manufacturing methods, interfacial structures, mechanical properties, applications, micromechanics, macromechanics, strength, fracture, fatigue, and design aspects.
